Spells:
Arcane Eye (Hag's Eye Hex4 Divi): Invisible remote eye moves 30'/rd for undefined min
Control Weather (Weather Control Hex7 Tran): Modifies seasonal weather in 2 mile radius for 4d12 hr
Cure Critical Wounds (Major Healing Hex4 Conj): Touched heals (undead suffers) 4d8+20 HP (DC 16 Will half)
Cure Light Wounds (Healing Hex2 Conj): Touched heals (undead suffers) 1d8+5 HP (DC 13 Will half)
Cure Moderate Wounds (Healing Hex3 Conj): Touched heals (undead suffers) 2d8+10 HP (DC 14 Will half)
Cure Serious Wounds (Major Healing Hex4 Conj): Touched heals (undead suffers) 3d8+15 HP (DC 16 Will half)
Disguise Self (Disguise Hex1 Illu): Self changes appearance and gains +10 Disguise for 200 min
Earthquake (Natural Disaster Hex8 Evoc): R1200' Intense tremor shakes 80' radius for 1 rd
Feather Fall (Flight Hex1 Tran): R75' 20 targets in 10' radius fall 60'/rd for 20 rd (DC 11 Will neg)
Fly (Flight Hex3 Tran): Touched gains 60' fly speed and +10 Fly skill for 20 min
Levitate (Flight Hex2 Tran): R75' Self moves willing target up and down 20'/rd for 20 min
Nightmare (Nightmares Hex5 Illu): Target suffers 1d10 HP and fatigue (DC 22 Will neg (modified for familiarity w/target))
Reincarnate (Forced Reincarnation Hex4 Tran): Restores willing soul, dead up to 1 week, to full health in a generated body
Resurrection (Life Giver Hex7 Conj): Fully restores touched target dead 200 years w/loss of 1 level
Sleep (Slumber Hex1 Ench): R300' 4 HD creatures in 10' radius sleep for 20 min (DC 11 Will neg)
Storm Of Vengeance (Natural Disaster Hex9 Conj): R1200' 360' radius storm deafens for 1d4x10 min (DC 22 Fort neg), then rains acid inflicting 1d6 HP, then generates 6 bolts lightning that inflict 10d6 HP each (DC 22 Ref half), then hail that inflicts 5d6 HP, then obscures vision for 6 rd
Magic Notes:
Intelligence Witch Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level Witch1, Witch2
Agony Hex: R60' Target suffers nauseated for 20 rd (DC 22 Fort ends) 1/target/dy
Arcane Spell Failure: 10%
Blight Hex: Touch kills vegetation in 200' radius over 1 wk or inflicts -1 Con/dy
Brew Potion: Create potion for up to 3rd level spell
Cackle Hex: R30' Extends self agony, charm, evil eye, fortune, and misfortune hex affects for 1 rd
Cantrips: May cast 0-level spells
Coven Hex: R30' May use aid another to give target w/Coven Hex +1 caster level for 1 rd
Craft Rod: Create magic rod
Death Curse Hex: R30' Target becomes fatigued (DC 22 Will neg), then exhausted, then dies (DC 22 Fort suffers 4d6+20 HP) 1/target/dy
Disguise Hex: May use Disguise Self effects for 20 hr/dy
Eschew Materials: Cast spells w/out materials
Eternal Slumber Hex: Touch or poison inflicts permanent sleep (DC 22 Will neg) 1/target/dy
Evil Eye Hex: R30' Target suffers -4 on choice of AC, ability checks, attack, saves, or skill checks for 5 rd (DC 22 Will 1 rd)
Extend Spell: x2 chosen spell duration uses +1 spell slot
Flight Hex: May use Feather Fall effects at will, Levitate 1/dy, Fly effects 20 min/dy
Forced Reincarnation Hex: R30' Target killed and receives Reincarnate (DC 22 Will neg) 1/target/dy
Fortune Hex: R30' Target gains better of 2 rolls on choice of ability check, attack, save, or skill check 1/rd for 3 rd 1/target/dy
Hag's Eye Hex: Can use Arcane Eye effects 20 min/dy and share w/witches in 10' radius
Healing Hex: May use Cure Moderate Wounds effects 1/target/dy
Life Giver Hex: May use Resurrection effects 1/dy
Major Healing Hex: May use Cure Critical Wounds effects 1/target/dy
Misfortune Hex: R30' Target suffers worse of 2 rolls on all ability checks, attack, saves, and skill checks (DC 22 Will neg) for 3 rd 1/target/dy
Natural Disaster Hex: May combine Storm Of Vengeance and Earthquake effects 1/dy
Nightmares Hex: R60' May use Nightmare effects (DC 22 Will ends)
Patron: Knows additional spells
Retribution Hex: R60' Target suffers half of damage it inflicts (DC 22 Will neg) for 2 rd
Slumber Hex: R30' May use Sleep effects (DC 22 Will neg) for 20 rd 1/target/dy
Tongues Hex: May understand and speak any spoken language for 20 min/dy
Vision Hex: Touched target gains vision of possible event within next yr (DC 22 Will neg)
Ward Hex: Target gains +4 AC and saves until hit or fails save
Waxen Image Hex: R30' Self controls target action 2 times (DC 22 Will ends) 1/target/dy
Weather Control Hex: May perform 1 hr ritual to use Control Weather effects 1/dy

Familiar: Centipede "Dedsel"

Companion Notes:
Companion Evasion: Reflex save yields no damage instead of half
Companion Improved Evasion: Failed Reflex save yields half damage
Deliver Touch Spells: Deliver touch spells if in contact w/master when cast
Empathic Link: Share emotions up to 1 mile
Scry On Familiar: Master views companion 1/dy
Share Spells: Master share self spell w/companion w/in 5'
Speak With Like Animals: Talk w/similar creatures
